sentences.en: But I don’t care if you’re an omnivore.
sentences.cn: 但是我也不会介意你是否是杂食动物。

sentences.en: He's an 18)omnivore, and what a trainer would call food-driven.
sentences.cn: 他是杂食动物，驯兽师称之为“食物驱动型”。

sentences.en: Human species is omnivore ; it can be tamed as a lamb, or vicious as a dingo.
sentences.cn: 人是草肉兼食的动物,即有绵羊的温顺, 亦有豺狼的凶狠.

sentences.en: Some of this reasoning turned up in Mr. Pollan's best - selling " Omnivore's Dilemma. "
sentences.cn: 在博兰先生最畅销的作品《杂食者的困境 》 中都能够找到这样的一些推论.

words.tran_cn: 杂食的；什么都读的；无所不吃的

trans.tran_en: an animal that eats both meat and plants
